title: Definitions - Definition of Content
text: All content or information, in any medium, provided by a party to the other party for use in conjunction with the performance of its obligations, including without limitation any text, music, sound, photographs, video, graphics, data, or software.

title: Definitions - Definition of Co-Branded Site
text: The website accessible through Domain Name, for the Services implemented by i-Escrow. The homepage of this website will visibly display both 2TheMart Marks and i-Escrow Marks.

title: Definitions - Definition of Customers
text: All users who access the Co-Branded Site.

title: Definitions - Definition of Escrow Services
text: Services where an agent holds a buyer's money in trust until the buyer approves the delivered item, at which point the agent releases the payment to the seller.

title: Development and Implementation - Overview
text: 2TheMart will promote Services to its auction users (buyers and sellers), and i-Escrow shall develop the Co-Branded Site and Information Transfer Mechanism.

title: Development and Implementation - Initial Information Transfer Mechanism Development
text: The parties shall negotiate in good faith to determine the operation of the Information Transfer Mechanism and document such operation and development fees in a Statement of Work (SOW).

title: Promotion - Marketing Efforts
text: After Launch Date, 2TheMart will widely promote the Services to auction users via auction emails, FAQ sections, and seller listing pages.

title: Payment - Advertising Fees
text: i-Escrow shall pay 2TheMart advertising fees based on the number of Transaction Inquiries.

title: Rights and Standards - Content Usage
text: 2TheMart grants i-Escrow a worldwide, non-exclusive right to use 2TheMart Content for the Co-Branded Site.

title: Disclaimer of Warranties
text: Each party provides all materials and services to the other party 'as is' without warranties or conditions.

title: Term and Termination - Term
text: The Agreement shall continue for one year following the Launch Date and may be renewed by mutual agreement.

title: Escrow Services Description
text: Successful completion of a transaction involves an exchange of merchandise with payment. i-Escrow holds payment from the buyer in trust until the seller ships the merchandise. Once the buyer accepts the merchandise, i-Escrow forwards the payment to the seller.
